overview:
Thien is a marketing strategist who worked in executive positions in multinational and is now dedicated to startups

He is half Vietnamese, half French who grew up in France and has traveled and lived around the whole world.

After achieving his Master in Business with a major in International Marketing, he integrated ORANGE DOMINICANA where he started out as a Marketing Assistant and had ascended to the position of Product Marketing Director when he decided to leave the company 5 years later. During his stay he was responsible for most of the product and service implementations and he had build up a team to manage this department.

He then moved to ONEMAX -the first worldwide Wimax Operator- filling the position of the Marketing and Communication Vice-President. Along with his team he managed the marketing plan, product roadmap and communication strategy.

In July 2009 he co-found he’s first startup, a web agency KATALYSTE. A second web agency founded in 2010, ELEPHANT, leads him to the launch of social media platform based on activities: WHAWHEE.
